title: VA_-_Floating_Between_The_Moon_And_The_Sun-Compiled_By_Ephedra_A
description:
KiCK YOUR BRAiN OUT WiTH

VA - Floating Between The Moon & The Sun

Artist........ VA
Album......... Floating Between The Moon & The Sun
Genre......... Psychedelic
Label......... Goa Madness Records
Hyperlink..... http://www.goamadnessrecords.com
Catalog....... GOM1CD003

Encoder....... LAME 32bits version 3.98.4

Tracks........ 8  Tracks
Playtime...... 71:35 min
Release.Size.. 135.13MB

[TRACKLiST]

1.  Proxeeus - Ramayana (Original Mix)          10:33
2.  M-Run - Sons Of The Temple                   9:09
3.  Artifact303 - In Your Mind (Nova Fractal     8:23
    Rmx)
4.  Trinodia - Distilled Illusions (2014 Mix)    7:55
5.  Goatree - Syslit Joint                       7:20
6.  Ephedra & Imba - Cosmic Harmony             11:12
7.  JIS - Zero Gravity                           7:27
8.  Crossing Mind - Iridium Zone (2014)          9:36

[REViEW]

Goa Madness Records is very proud to present to you
their 3rd release.

Floating between the moon and the sun! Eight
beautiful tracks selected with love and passion by
Ephedra and Kuririn! This compilation will take you
on a journey from the acidic sounds of nighttime
Goatrance to the melodic and trancy vibes for the
shiny mornings.

It all starts with the French newcomer Proxeeus, who
will kick you back in time with some acidic oldskool
sounds (remember the golden 90's?). Next, M-run
delivers his typical groovy beats and psycho sounds
of which he alone knows the secret and Nova Fractal
will smash you into space with his stellar remix of
Artifact303: 'In your mind'. The compilation then
evolves with a very bouncy track from the Swedish
master Trinodia followed by Goatree who brings a very
melodic and acidic track with a Psytrance edge.

Ephedra and Imba strike back with a pure morning
track coming from the deep cosmos while JIS brings
you a very melodic and trancey piece of art. The
compilation ends with a sublime downtempo track from
the French producer Crossing Mind! Just listen and
let yourself float between the moon and the sun.

          We would like to take the
        opportunity to point out that psytrance
       needs YOUR SUPPORT. We only want to
     give you a preview in psytrance,
  ambient and electronic music and
 in our opinion this is absolutely
NO alternative to buying.

 MP3 isnt the same as holding a
bought record in your hands !!

You need to feel the bass to go with the
flow ... and that's what mp3 just can't
give you. So better get it in high
quality, while it's still available
and not soldout.

  Please support the artists and
  especially smaller labels that make
 it possible to enjoy the music you
seem to love that much!

Our releases are for scene internal use so
KEEP THEM OFF P2P AND OTHER PUBLIC PLACES!!

So much for now
meet ya @ the next party ... somewhere.

MYCEL - sending lamers to /dev/null since 2003

We bow our heads to our old friends.

Deep respect to you!

Also we would like to greet all of the

still alive quality scenegroups/sceners!

want to be part of the mycelenium?

Ascii done with love to my lil d3vil.
          - Creature of Hell
